description.displayText: I can't express how grateful we are to have found Lauren. We have hired her numerous times for not only last minute outings, but overnight care. She is readily available to help out when needed, which has been key with last minute changes in my schedule. She is very sweet, reliable, and trustworthy. Absolutely, one of the best, hands down! We look forward to having her in our family loop for years to come.
